name: Ganbare Goemon 2: Kiteretsu Shougun Magginesu
description:
Ganbare Goemon 2: Kiteretsu Shōgun Magginesu (がんばれゴエモン2 奇天烈将軍マッギネス? lit. "Let's Go! Goemon 2: Very Strange General McGuiness") is a 1993 action-adventure video game developed and published by Konami for the Nintendo Super Famicom console exclusively in Japan and the second game in the Ganbare Goemon series to be released on that system.

Source: Mystical Ninja wiki

Has a fan translation
